definition: curved segment (of a road or river or railroad track etc.), to change direction
details:
noun
- curved segment (of a road or river or railroad track etc.)
= synonyms: curve
- diagonal line traversing a shield from the upper right corner to the lower left
= synonyms: bend dexter
- movement that causes the formation of a curve
= synonyms: bending
- a circular segment of a curve
= example: a circular segment of a curve
= synonyms: twist
- an angular or rounded shape made by folding
= synonyms: flexure
verb
- to change direction
= example: to change direction
- to form a curve or angle
= example: to form a curve or angle
= synonyms: flex
